markdownRemark.html: Situated in Almunecar. The school is located in the Almerimar residential estate (El Ejido), next to the Punta Entinas nature park and facing the sea. SEK-Alborán is one of the 9 schools making up SEK International Schools. Co-ed day (0-18 years). English National Curriculum education.
